alert.note: Alert for Noble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 10:44AM EST until February 19 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east central Ohio, including the following county, Noble. * WHEN...Until 1000 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of creeks and other flood-prone locations is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1042 AM EST, Gauge reports indicate flooding is already occurring in the warned area. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Caldwell, Dudley, Belle Valley and Dexter City. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
